sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
belongs to someone
, je njegova last ali mu pripada.

seg.quote: The land belongs to a big family.
...a myth belonging to some tribe in Western Australia.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
belongs to a particular group
, je član tiste skupine.

seg.quote: She belongs to the Labour Party.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
belongs in a particular place
, bi moral biti tam.

seg.quote: The plates don't belong in that cupboard.
